extension.name: SMS STOP/unsubscribe processor
extension.description: Acts upon received SMS messages beginning with keywords such as STOP, which indicate the remote contact's wish to unsubscribe. This extension replies to the contact acknowledging their request, and sets them as 'do not SMS'. It is an attempt at following section 10.1.1 (STOP command implementation) of the Clickatell two-way technical guide.
extension.comments: This extension requires CiviCooP's SMS API extension (org.civicoop.smsapi) in order to send the acknowledgement SMS.
